meta.title: We Create Web Services for Millions
meta.description: Our specialty is front-end web development outsourcing. We bring logic to the world with JavaScript. And dream of the stars.

imgAlt.greeting: Illustration with wavy horizontal lines, geometric figures and a small rocket flying along the lines.

imgAlt.reliability: Illustration: a man folds a wall of lego

cleanCode.title: Clean Code
cleanCode.subTitle: A good code is a clean code. What matters is not only what the code does, but also how it looks
cleanCode.text: Clean and clear code makes it easy to support, quickly add new functionality and make changes with less costs. A messy code with a high complexity brings a lot of problems to the team, reduces productivity, and makes the life of those who will work with it later much more complicated.
cleanCode.text_2: Whether we are working on a large project that has started long before us and will continue to exist after, or launching a completely new product, we are particularly mindful of putting things in order. Regular code reviews and capturing the best practices help us do this.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.subTitle: We care about our clients’ reputation and therefore we pay special attention to the testing
reliability.text: Having QA-specialists in each team ensures a normal development process. We apply auto-tests, unit-tests, integration and manual testing depending on project needs. Our QA engineers help us minimize the risk of errors occurring in the final product. And knowing that our code is tested and reliable, we can safely develop new features if necessary, and be certain that the already existing code will not be surprisingly affected.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.subTitle: Do you know how many users have special needs when using the Internet?
accessibility.text: A web site designed without applying accessibility principles may lose up to 15% of its audience. Every page and every block should not only be well written, so that only developers can appreciate it, but first of all, should be well delivered, so that every user can enjoy it on every level. We care.
accessibility.text_2: By dividing the site into functional blocks and working with tags, we provide equal access to your product for everybody.

ux.title: UX
ux.subTitle: We understand how important little things in design are, and we can do pixel-perfect development
ux.text: But we never forget about user-friendliness. Developing your designs we are basically the first users of your product, so we are not just blindly executing but always care and draw your attention to the things that can affect the product in future. Perfectionism must be smart.

webSecurity.title: Web Security
webSecurity.subTitle: Web applications should not only be well written, reliable, user-friendly but also business secure
webSecurity.text: We understand that a small vulnerability in an application can lead to significant financial and reputational risks. One incorrectly implemented authorization or payment form can lead to hacking and extraction of user or company data. From the very beginning, we think very carefully about the code architecture and pay special attention to this issue, even if there is a security audit on the client side.
